short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A place to tell the world what it is you see in the sky

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is Cloud Shapes?

Have you ever pointed to a cloud in the sky and said - "look mah, an xyz" ?
Cloud Shapes allows you to compare what it is you see in the sky with the minds of everyone on the internet!

Say what you see

View random cloud photographs other users have uploaded and type in what it is you can see.

Compare to others

You will then be given the answers every other user has submitted so far. After taking a moment to digest just how weird and wonderful other peoples' subconscious truly are, you can agree with their answer or head on to the next cloud.
